passages.text:
Eh?! You again. Can't you leave me in peace?
[[Sorry, I'll go.|Go]]
[[Nope.|nope]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
Too late! You've scared them off again! Do you know how hard it is to catch a fish with someone like you around?! Fish are sensitive, perceptive creatures!
[[Continue]]
passages.name: Go

passages.text:
Bah! What did I do to deserve this! All I want to do is catch one measly fish, and yet here I am, being bombarded with nonsense from every direction by you and everyone else like you. How do you even hear yourself think over all that noise?!
[[I'm not being that loud.|Not loud]]
[[What do you mean, "everyone else like me?"|Your kind]]

links.name: I'm not being that loud.|Not loud
links.link: I'm not being that loud.|Not loud

links.name: What do you mean, "everyone else like me?"|Your kind
links.link: What do you mean, "everyone else like me?"|Your kind

passages.name: nope

passages.text:
They need peace and quiet, or else they'll get overloaded and leave, never to return! I thought I was getting away from this kind of nonsense by coming here, but I guess your kind are everywhere, aren't they?!
[[I guess so.|Guess so]]
[[What do you mean, "your kind?"|Your kind]]

links.name: What do you mean, "your kind?"|Your kind
links.link: What do you mean, "your kind?"|Your kind

passages.name: Continue

passages.text:
Bah. All that self awareness, and yet you have no desire to change.
[[Bye]]
passages.name: Guess so

passages.text:
Screamers! Yappers! Gossipers, children, dogs, lawnmowers, or anyone else that disturbs the peace of nature with their unchecked decibels!
[[Bye]]
passages.name: Your kind

passages.text: Now leave me be before I blow a gasket!
passages.name: Bye

passages.text:
Of course you don't! You must be half deaf after half a lifetime of screaming like that! I'm surprised you can even understand a single word I'm saying!
[[Bye]]
passages.name: Not loud
